00037 #include "InstructionQueue.hpp"
00038 #include "ShapeImprovementWrapper.hpp"
00039 #include "MsqTimer.hpp"
00040 #include "MsqDebug.hpp"
00041 #include "UntangleBetaQualityMetric.hpp"
00042 #include "LPtoPTemplate.hpp"
00043 #include "ConjugateGradient.hpp"
00044 #include "TerminationCriterion.hpp"
00045 #include "IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio.hpp"
00046 #include "FeasibleNewton.hpp"
00047 #include "InstructionQueue.hpp"
00048 #include "QualityAssessor.hpp"
00049 
00050 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00051 
00052 const double DEF_UNT_BETA = 1e-8;
00053 const double DEF_SUC_EPS = 1e-4;
00054 
00061 ShapeImprovementWrapper::ShapeImprovementWrapper(MsqError& ,
00062                                                  double cpu_time,
00063                                                  double grad_norm,
00064                                                  int parallel_iterations) 
00065  : maxTime(cpu_time), 
00066    gradNorm(grad_norm),
00067    untBeta(DEF_UNT_BETA),
00068    successiveEps(DEF_SUC_EPS),
00069    parallelIterations(parallel_iterations)
00070 {}
00071 
00072 ShapeImprovementWrapper::ShapeImprovementWrapper(double cpu_time,
00073                                                  double grad_norm,
00074                                                  int parallel_iterations) 
00075  : maxTime(cpu_time), 
00076    gradNorm(grad_norm),
00077    untBeta(DEF_UNT_BETA),
00078    successiveEps(DEF_SUC_EPS),
00079    parallelIterations(parallel_iterations)
00080 {}
00081  
00082  
00083 void ShapeImprovementWrapper::run_wrapper( Mesh* mesh,
00084                                            ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00085                                            MeshDomain* domain,
00086                                            Settings* settings,
00087                                            QualityAssessor* qa,
00088                                            MsqError& err )
00089 {
00090     // Define an untangler
00091   UntangleBetaQualityMetric untangle_metric( untBeta );
00092   LPtoPTemplate untangle_func( 2, &untangle_metric );
00093   ConjugateGradient untangle_global( &untangle_func );
00094   TerminationCriterion untangle_inner, untangle_outer;
00095   untangle_global.use_global_patch();
00096   untangle_inner.add_absolute_quality_improvement( 0.0 );
00097   untangle_inner.add_absolute_successive_improvement( successiveEps );
00098   untangle_outer.add_iteration_limit( 1 );
00099   untangle_global.set_inner_termination_criterion( &untangle_inner );
00100   untangle_global.set_outer_termination_criterion( &untangle_outer );
00101 
00102     // define shape improver
00103   IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio inverse_mean_ratio;
00104   inverse_mean_ratio.set_averaging_method( QualityMetric::LINEAR );
00105   LPtoPTemplate obj_func( 2, &inverse_mean_ratio );
00106   FeasibleNewton feas_newt( &obj_func );
00107   TerminationCriterion term_inner, term_outer;
00108   feas_newt.use_global_patch();
00109   qa->add_quality_assessment( &inverse_mean_ratio );
00110   term_inner.add_absolute_gradient_L2_norm( gradNorm );
00111   term_inner.add_relative_successive_improvement( successiveEps );
00112   term_outer.add_iteration_limit( pmesh ? parallelIterations : 1 );
00113   feas_newt.set_inner_termination_criterion( &term_inner );
00114   feas_newt.set_outer_termination_criterion( &term_outer );
00115 
00116     // Apply CPU time limit to untangler
00117   if (maxTime > 0.0)
00118     untangle_inner.add_cpu_time( maxTime );
00119   
00120     // Run untangler
00121   InstructionQueue q1;
00122   Timer totalTimer;
00123   q1.set_master_quality_improver( &untangle_global, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00124   q1.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00125   q1.run_common( mesh, pmesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00126   
00127     // If limited by CPU time, limit next step to remaning time
00128   if (maxTime > 0.0) {
00129     double remaining = maxTime - totalTimer.since_birth();
00130     if (remaining <= 0.0 ){
00131       MSQ_DBGOUT(2) << "Optimization is terminating without perfoming shape improvement." << std::endl;
00132       remaining = 0.0;
00133     }
00134     term_inner.add_cpu_time( remaining );
00135   }
00136   
00137     // Run shape improver
00138   InstructionQueue q2;
00139   q2.set_master_quality_improver( &feas_newt, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00140   q2.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00141   q2.run_common( mesh, pmesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00142 }
00143 
00144 } // namespace Mesquite
